Rulings.Tengu: ● This card is a Counter Trap, so it can be used in the Damage Step, even during Damage Calculation.

Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] As a Counter Trap Card, "Gladiator Beast War Chariot" can be activated in the Damage Step. If you control a face-up "Gladiator Beast" monster when the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" to Special Summon itself is activated, you will be able to activate "Gladiator Beast War Chariot" to negate the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness".

PSCT.Tengu:
① When a Monster Effect is activated while you control a "Gladiator Beast" monster:
Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
